case.title: Beautiful evening (Nolita / Bowery)
case.text: Hello, happy friday! Anyone in the same situation, no plans for this beautiful evening but looking to get out with good company for a drink or dinner. I'd love to get out for laughs, good conversation and good time. I'm open to ideas. Please be between 30-45. charming, fun, sense of humor, in shape, professon, friendly and caring. I am strongly attracted to highly intelligent, highly ambitious, and highly chivalrous men. YOUR PIC GETS MINE.
